section_full_path: My Shifts > Upcoming Shifts > Cancel shifts
title: Free Cancellation

custom_steps_separated.content: Create and activate a new user OR log in as an active user with no cancellations in the past 30 days
Click the X to close the post-booking page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is taken to Shift details screen with Shift booked CTA

Timer XX:XX left to free cancel, View shift summary btn and Cancel shift with no penalties btn
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/efg12345-1111-2222-3333-444444444401)

custom_steps_separated.content: Scroll to the bottom of Shift details screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: there is a "I can't make it" btn

custom_steps_separated.content: click "I can't make it" button at the bottom of the shift details page or "Cancel shift with no penalties" button on the shift details CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
- Verify: the "Cancel this shift?" page loads
- Verify: The shift information should be present
- Verify: There is a clock icon present along with the text: Cancelling now has no penalty
- Verify: The following text is present: Cancelling within X minutes of booking has no penalty
- Verify: There should be text "Free cancellation expiring in xxxx" where xxxx is the time left before free cancelation expires
- Verify: There is a button present which has the following label: "I don't need to cancel". 
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/efg12345-1111-2222-3333-444444444402)

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap it "I don't need to cancel" btn
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is taken back to shift details screen

custom_steps_separated.content: click "I can't make it" button at the bottom of the shift details page or "Cancel shift with no penalties" button on the shift details CTA.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Cancel this shift? screen is loaded
User is taken back to the shift details page and a Green banner should appear with the following text: "Your shift has been cancelled."
